name: Beauty and a Dream
description:
Based on a dream and the original story by Gabrielle-Suzanne de Villeneuve, Beauty is the resident nerd of her town, concerned with playing games with her friends and reading as much as she can. On the first day of her father becoming mayor, she ends up cursed to not leave the royal palace that was practically in her backyard. How does she handle it? How is this curse broken? Will she and the royalty get along?

Features:

Two Endings

A rather different adaptation of the classic fairy tale
